app_name.description: The name of the application. Shown in the web store.

app_name_short.description: The short name of the application. Shown at the top of the dropdown menu.

app_desc.message: Assistente per la gestione del tempo con la tecnica Pomodoro®.
app_desc.description: The short description of the application. Shown in the web store.

chrome_web_store_description.message:
• Pause corte e lunghe
• Icona nella toolbar con conto alla rovescia
• Tiene traccia delle statistiche e della cronologia dei Pomodori
• Intervalli lunghi configurabili
• Durate di tempo configurabili
• Notifiche desktop e tab
• Notifiche audio in più di 20 suoni
• Suoni del timer a ticchettio
• Timer automatici programmati
• Software open source
chrome_web_store_description.description: Detailed extension description shown to users in the Chrome Web Store.

pomodoro_assistant.description: Marinara title tagline. Shown on the settings-feedback page.

start_pomodoro_cycle.description: Menu entry to start a new Pomodoro cycle. Shown in the dropdown menu.

restart_pomodoro_cycle.description: Menu entry to restart the current Pomodoro cycle. Shown in the dropdown menu.

restart_timer.description: Menu entry to restart the current timer. Shown in the dropdown menu.

start_focusing.description: Start a focus session. Shown in the dropdown menu, timer expiration page, and in browser notifications.

start_short_break.description: Start a short break session. Shown in the dropdown menu, timer expiration page, and in browser notifications.

start_break.description: Start a break session. Shown in the dropdown menu, timer expiration page, and in browser notifications.

start_long_break.description: Start a long break session. Shown in the dropdown menu, timer expiration page, and in browser notifications.

stop_timer.description: Menu entry to stop the current timer. Shown in the dropdown menu.

pause_timer.description: Menu entry to pause the current timer. Shown in the dropdown menu.

resume_timer.description: Menu entry to resume the paused timer. Shown in the dropdown menu.

pomodoro_history.description: Menu entry to view Pomodoro history/stats. Shown in the dropdown menu.

timer_paused.description: Tooltip to indicate the current timer is paused. Shown when hovering over the toolbar icon.

pomodoro_count_zero.description: Label for zero Pomodoros. Shown on the expiration page.

pomodoro_count_one.description: Label for a single Pomodoro. Shown on the expiration page.

pomodoro_count_many.description: Label for many Pomodoros. Shown on the expiration page.

settings.description: Settings tab. Shown on the settings page.

history.description: History tab. Shown on the settings page.

feedback.description: Feedback tab and section header. Shown on the settings page.

focus_title.description: Focus section header. Shown on the settings page.

short_break_title.description: Short Break section header. Shown on the settings page.

long_break_title.description: Long Break section header. Shown on the settings page.

autostart_title.description: Autostart section header. Shown on the settings page.

autostart_description.message: Programma il primo Pomodoro del giorno per avviarsi automaticamente all'orario specificato
autostart_description.description: Autostart setting description. Shown on the settings page.

time.description: Time input label. Shown on the settings page.

duration.description: Timer duration label. Shown on the settings page.

minutes.description: Minutes label for timer duration. Shown on the settings page.

timer_sound_label.description: Timer sound label. Shown on the settings page.

hover_preview.message: Passa sopra con il mouse per l'anteprima
hover_preview.description: Hover to preview note. Shown on the settings page.

speed_label.description: Timer sound speed label. Shown on the settings page.

bpm.description: Beats per minute; speed unit for timer sound. Shown on the settings page.

none.description: The 'no sound' option. Represents nothing selected. Shown on the settings page.

when_complete.description: Section label for events to fire when timer completes. Shown on the settings page.

show_desktop_notification.description: Desktop notification option. Shown on the settings page.

show_new_tab_notification.description: New tab notification option. Shown on the settings page.

play_audio_notification.description: Audio notification label. Shown on the settings page.

take_a_long_break_setting.description: Long break settings label. Shown on the settings page.

never.description: Long break option. Shown in the long break dropdown on the settings page.

time_remaining.description: Badge tooltip to show time remaining for current timer.
